title: Palmers Gallery - Typeface id
content:
Good morning everyone, back for another id. Thanks again you guys have been a lot of help.

Here it is:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053745im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/index_5550.1.jpg)

 [‹ From Frieze magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45063 "Go to previous forum topic") [Eurostar ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053745/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45070 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Trick

comments.content: Public domain font. get it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053745/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=black_chancery&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=Palmers+Gallery&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha) for example.
